notification.saved: Your consent settings have been saved!

front.title: We value your privacy
front.description: We use cookies and technologies such as Google Analytics to count, track and analyze visits. This helps us to improve your experience on this website. Click below to consent to use these technologies. You can change your consent choices any time by returning to this site.

options.title: We value your privacy
options.description: You can change the settings below to determine how you want your data to be used. Each purpose describes how we and our partners use your data.

cookieDecisions.title: Cookie decisions
cookieDecisions.description: Saves your decisions that you set here!

pwa_prompt.title: PWA prompt
pwa_prompt.description: This cookie saves whether or not you have been prompted to install this website as PWA.

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.description: We use Google Analytics to count, track and analyze visits. This helps us to understand how people use the site.
